entries.entry: You get 2 Power-ups to try for Free!
Tap Sven's Carrot to break 9 random Ice Crystals. <TOKEN>
Combine Power-ups to unleash powerful effects.
Congratulations! You unlocked Kristoff and his Ice Axe Power-up!
Match colors in a "T" or "L" shape to create an Iceberg! Match it to break all Ice Crystals around it.

Power-ups can be used for any selected character.
Each Troll Magic transforms into a random Power-up or Item.
Congratulations! You unlocked Sven and his Carrot Power-up!
You didn't remove all the Snow.
Combine 2 Power-ups to create a powerful effect. Try it now with the Windchill and the Iceberg.

Reach the target score before you run out of MOVES!

Tap Kristoff's Ice Axe to break 6 random Ice Crystals with Frost under them. <TOKEN>
Match 4 or 5 Ice Crystals in different shapes to create a Windchill, Iceberg, or Glacier.
Use 1 Snowball (+5 moves) to continue this level?
You didn't eliminate all required Ice Crystals.

Open link and exit the game?
TIP: Having trouble reaching the target score? Make matches quickly to earn score multipliers.
Drop the Special Items to the bottom of the board!
Purchased Failed. Please check your network settings and try again later.
Congratulations! You unlocked Pabbie and his Troll Magic Power-up!
The Freezer tile is similar to the Snow tile, but one Freezer tile expands to an adjacent position for each turn that no Freezer tiles are broken.
Each Sword breaks Tiles as you swipe the board.
In-app purchases disabled. Please enable them in the device's Settings and try again.
Accomplish each level's objective and beat the target score to advance the story and unlock new levels.
The Snow can be broken by creating a match next to it. Try it out, then clear all the Snow from the board!
You have a full set of lives. Come back and PLAY!
Tap the Snowball to receive 5 Extra Moves. <FREE_SNOWBALLS>
Remove all Frost from the board!
Tap the Ice Pick, then select any Ice Crystal to break it. <FREE_ICE_PICKS>

You have 2 Snowballs to try for Free!
Reach the target score before you run out of TIME!
You have 2 Ice Picks to try for Free!
Each Ice Axe breaks 6 random Tiles.
Match 5 colors in a row to create a Glacier! Combine it with any Ice Crystal to break all Ice Crystals of the same color.
Tap Hans' Sword, then swipe across the board to break Ice Crystals. <TOKEN>
Each Ice Pick breaks 1 selected Tile.
Tap the Hourglass to receive 15 Extra Seconds. <FREE_HOURGLASSES>
Tap Olaf's Hot Chocolate, then an Ice Crystal to change it into a needed Ice Crystal. <TOKEN>
Touch an Ice Crystal and slide it with your finger. Match 3 Ice Crystals of the same color to break them and score points.
TIP: Having trouble reaching the target score? Make matches quickly to earn score multipliers.
If you're enjoying Frozen Free Fall, please take a few moments to rate it.
You didn't drop all the Special Items.
Congratulations! You unlocked Elsa and her Glacier Power-up!
No more possible moves. Try using a Power-up!
Match 4 colors in a row to create a Windchill! Match it to break all Ice Crystals in its path.
Each Glacier breaks all Tiles of the selected color.
Congratulations! You unlocked Hans and his Sword Power-up!
The Locked tile can be broken by matching it with 2 Ice Crystals of the same color.
Tap Pabbie's Troll Magic to summon a random item to use during this level. <TOKEN>
You have 2 Hourglasses to try for Free!
Congratulations! You unlocked the Ice Pick!
You finished all levels! New levels coming SOON!
Tap Anna's Torch, then select 8 connecting Ice Crystals to break them. <TOKEN>

Additional content can be purchased in Frozen Free Fall. Purchasing this content costs real money and will be charged to your iTunes account. You can adjust your device settings to lock the ability to make in-app purchases.
Tap Elsa's Glacier, then select an Ice Crystal to break all Ice Crystals of the same color. <TOKEN>
Each Torch breaks 8 connected Tiles of your choice.
The Frost can be broken by creating a match over it. Try it out, then clear all the Frost from the board!
Use 1 Hourglass (+15 seconds) to continue this level?
Congratulations! You unlocked Anna and her Torch Power-up!
Swipe the Ice Crystals to match 3 of the same color!
You didn't remove all the Frost.
Congratulations! You unlocked Olaf and his Hot Chocolate Power-up!
